result.execSummary:
The defendant Lukas Anthony Schuh was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Computer Message-Threaten/Obscenity, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.0125(2)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superAgency.notes:
with DA's Office  
Deferred Prosecution Agreement:   Proceedings suspended for period of 12 months.  DEF may not commit any new violations of State Law; Refrain from the use of any social media including Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, etc.; DEF will complete 50 hours of community service.
Defendant's failure to comply with all the terms of the agreement can result in a reinstitution of the proceedings against him.   DEF waives right to Speedy Trial during the period of this agreement and agrees to a tolling of any applicable civil and criminal statues of limitations.
BOND CONTINUES.  
There is a No Contact provision on bond with Annette Taylor.  As DEF attends School with Miss Taylor, court explains DEF must have no INTENTIONAL contact with Annette Taylor.

supervisions.notes: Sentence w/held probation 1 year - no contact with Annette Taylor - 40 hours community service and costs of $443.00 - any counseling DOC may impose - 16 CM 331 is dismissed and read-in.

miscConds.notes: Costs $243.00   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent
